additional_info:
Furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, pass-through, Elevator, Heating system: central, Hot water: gas 
 For Rent (long-term)! Charming studio apartment in a peaceful and clean area, just 3 mins driving distance from the Vake park. Bright, totally furnished and fully equipped to feel at home. You'll find here a comfortable living area with open kitchen and a balcony with view, a separated bedroom area with balcony, a separated bathroom. 9th floor with a very clean, attractive entrance and elevator. Address: 2 Tskneti Highway.Map: For Rent (long-term)! Charming studio apartment in a peaceful and clean area, just 3 mins driving distance from the Vake park.
